item.title: Intigriti's monthly challenge - May 2022
item.description: This content is password protected for the time being. Javascript needs to be enabled to decrypt content The challenge ⏰ It's CHALLENGE O'CLOCK! 👉 Find the XSS before Friday June 3th! 👉 Win €300 in SWAG prizes! 👉 We'll release a tip for every 100 likes on this tweet! Thanks @PiyushThePal for the challenge! 👇https://t.co/X0nq805bVE — INTIGRITI (@intigriti) May 27, 2022 First contact While browsing the website, one can notice the ?
